title: Wayne Farms, LLC Recalls Ready-To-Eat Chicken Products Due To Potential Processing Deviation
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 28, 2017 Wayne Farms, LLC, a Decatur, Ala. establishment, is recalling approximately 12,610 pounds of ready-to-eat chicken products due to a potential processing defect, resulting in the potential survival of bacterial pathogens in the products, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and...
impacted_products: Cases of 2 clear plastic 5-lb bags of “Waffle Breaded Bites: Fully Cooked Breaded White Meat Chicken Bites.”
